title: Food in Gent, Belgium
name: Food in Gent, Belgium
description:
A Map by Matuvu

Good food in Gent

properties.name: 't Oud Clooster
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuPerfect yet simple and cheap. Setting in an old monastery/church. Tel. 09-233.78.02 Zwarte Zusterstraat 5 9000 Gent Closed on Sunday and Monday. Little to choose but the \'brochette oud clooster\' is fabulous.

properties.name: A food affair
properties.description: Posted by Matuvu Nice loungy restaurant. Nice food. Tel. : 09.224.18 05 Fax : 09.224.17.83 Korte Meer 25 9000 GHENT Closing days: Sunday, Monday noon, Saturday noon Cuisine: International - Fusion Budget : ± 30 Euro

properties.name: De Orchidee
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuVlaanderenstraat 105, Ghent, BelgiumPerfect for lunch. Cheap Tel. : 09.224.40.49 Vlaanderenstraat 105 9000 GENT Sluitingsdagen: Open 7/7 Kitchen: Thais , Wok , Vegetarisch Budget : - 25 Euro

properties.name: Fabula Rasa
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuA cosy real Belgian Cafe with good food. Smoking is still allowed here (which many like and as many hate) The food is cheap, yet good. Open all week. tel. : 09/225.63.30 F. Lousbergskaai 134

properties.name: Faim Fatale
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuNice cosy restaurant. Perfect place for friends. Nice surrounding. Tel. : 09.269.04.48 Zuidstationstraat 14 9000 GENT Closed: Sunday, Monday, Saturday afternoon Kitchen: Frans , Internationaal - Fusion Budget : ± 40 Euro

properties.name: Faim de toi
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuA perfect place to take your lover. Not that cheap but really good fusion kitchen. Tel. : 09.223.63.93 Belfortstraat 10 9000 GHENT Closing days: Sunday noon, Monday, Saturday noon Cuisine: International - Fusion Setting: Contemporary surroundings Budget : ± 40 Euro

properties.name: Igor
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuGrote Huidevettershoek 10, Gent, BelgiëPerfect for a breakfast or a drink. Telenet wifi. Tel. : 09.224.36.93 Grote Huidevettershoek 10 9000 GHENT Closing days: Open 7/7 Cuisine: Brasserie Setting: Contemporary surroundings Budget : - 25 Euro

properties.name: Le grand bleu
properties.description: Posted by Matuvu A superb lobster resto for no money. Good whenever. But cheap at lunch. Make sure you make a reservation. Tel. : 09.220.50.25 Fax : 09.329.50.25 Snepkaai 15 9000 GHENT Closing days: Saturday noon - Sunday noon - Monday Cuisine: Fish dishes , Crustacean dishes Accommodations : Terrace Budget : ± 30 Euro

properties.name: Rood
properties.description: Posted by MatuvuPerfect spot to go with friends. Nice card. Good food. Tel. : 09.223.80.75 Sleepstraat 210 9000 GHENT Closing days: Saturday noon - Sunday Cuisine: International - Fusion Accommodations : Terrace Budget : - 25 Euro
